attributes.action: Reduce Retirement Age back to 65 for Men and 60 for women.
attributes.additional_details: I just want back what was agreed at the time I left school. Instead of that the goalposts getting shifted each and every time parliament wants to.
attributes.background: As a 58 year old man having worked my whole life I think it only fair that we get to retire at an age we are able to enjoy some life we have left. I started my working career at 16 in 1979. Then I would be able to retire at 65 with a state pension.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that call for changes to state pension age that discriminate on the grounds of sex, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Move the State Pension age back to 60 for both men & women: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581736
